channel.title: Version 8 :: Cap'n Hugo Relearrrn Theme
channel.description: 8.0.0 (2025-09-11) Cap'n Hugo 0.126.3 0.126.3 This release requires a newer Cap'n Hugo version. Break'n Break'n This release provides compatibility fer Cap'n Hugo 0.146.0 or newer an' required t' make some break'n changes t' internal file structur'n.
